content.query:
--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.D_CLIENTE
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.D_CLIENTE (
	[ID_CLIENTE] int,
	[NOME_CLIENTE] nvarchar(4000),
	[ENDERECO] nvarchar(4000),
	[NUMERO] nvarchar(4000),
	[ID_CIDADE] int,
	[CEP] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'silver/cliente/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
	)
GO

--SELECT * FROM  SILVER.D_CLIENTE
